title: Incorporates the percentages of housing reserved under federal law for persons with mobility impairments and sensory impairments into New York state rehabilitation
summary: Incorporates the percentages of housing reserved under federal law for persons with mobility impairments (5%) and sensory impairments (2%) into New York state rehabilitation and building codes.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the public housing law, in relation to percentage of accessible units in all state funded rehabilitation and new multi-family housing construction
